name: frontbase-supervisor
description: FrontBase.io: Supervisor is responsible for keeping the app online and OS-level interactions.

scripts.prepare: git -C /frontbase/system/client pull && yarn --cwd ../client install && yarn --cwd ../client build && git -C /frontbase/system/server pull && yarn --cwd ../server install && yarn --cwd ../client build
scripts.update: yarn updateSupervisor && yarn updateServer && yarn updateClient
scripts.updateClient: git -C /frontbase/system/client pull && yarn --cwd ../client install && yarn --cwd ../client build
scripts.updateServer: git -C /frontbase/system/server reset --hard && git -C /frontbase/system/server pull && yarn --cwd ../server install && yarn --cwd ../server build && yarn restartServer
scripts.updateEngine: git -C /frontbase/system/engine reset --hard && git -C /frontbase/system/engine pull && yarn --cwd ../engine install && yarn --cwd ../engine build && yarn restartEngine
scripts.updateSupervisor: git -C /frontbase/system/supervisor reset --hard && git -C /frontbase/system/supervisor pull && yarn --cwd ../supervisor install && yarn build && yarn restartSupervisor
